forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
